Author: Heipos
Text: I had a box of wings that said the calorie count per wings and its 80 calories for a tiny wing...that's way too much considering the ammount you have to eat to be full and high risk binge food.

Author: emily_blank
Text: I believe a serving (3oz) of meat “supposedly” is the size of a deck of cards or the palm of your hand... so I’m guessing one ounce must be slightly larger than a finger? It’s all relative to the size of your hands though...
